welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Birkenau, Germany! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Birkenau has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
